A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
This whole film felt pointless. Characters don't grow or progress and if you had any doubt that Rey was a Mary-Sue this film confirms it tenfold. 

Oh and if you like Lukes character or Leia\, be prepared to cringe.

Visually nice\, but when your characters are bad\, character growth is nonexistent\, story lacks any interest then it's like buying a really huge dimond. Pretty\, but untimitly a waste of money because it does nothing.
